verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14418'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>طَّارِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ق</tajweed>ِ
verses.translation: В знак неба и идущего в ночи

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13858'>دْ</tajweed>رَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ٮٰ</tajweed>كَ مَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14419'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>طَّارِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ق</tajweed>ُ
verses.translation: Как объяснить тебе, что значит "в ночь идущий

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14420'>جْ</tajweed>مُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14421'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>ثَّاقِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ب</tajweed>ُ

verses.text_uthmani: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8426'>ن ك</tajweed>ُلُّ نَفْ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14422'>سٍ ل</tajweed>َّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌ
verses.translation: Нет ни одной живой души, Что над собою стража не имеет

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلْيَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14313'>نظ</tajweed>ُرِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14314'>ٱ</tajweed>لْإِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2732'>نس</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نُ مِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ خُلِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ق</tajweed>َ
verses.translation: Пусть человек подумает над тем, как он был создан

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: خُلِقَ م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':840'>ِن م</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14423'>ءٍ د</tajweed>َافِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ق</tajweed>ٍ
verses.translation: Он создан из воды, что изливается (струей)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَخْرُجُ م<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':4612'>ِنۢ ب</tajweed>َيْنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14424'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صُّلْبِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14425'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>تَّر<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ب</tajweed>ِ
verses.translation: И из грудных костей, и из хребта исходит

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> عَلَىٰ رَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14426'>جْ</tajweed>عِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> لَقَادِرٌ
verses.translation: Поистине, Он в силах воскресить его опять

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَوْمَ تُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14427'>بْ</tajweed>لَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14428'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّر<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِرُ
verses.translation: В тот День Все тайное подвергнется проверке

verses.text_uthmani: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٍ وَلَا نَاصِرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَمَا لَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':5395'>ن ق</tajweed>ُوَّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14429'>ةٍ و</tajweed>َلَا نَاصِرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Famā lahū min quwwatiw wa lā nāṣir(in).
verses.translation: Лишенным всякой помощи и власти будет (человек)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ ذَاتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14430'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رَّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14431'>جْ</tajweed>عِ
verses.translation: В знак неба, что вершит обратный путь

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ ذَاتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14432'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صَّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14433'>دْ</tajweed>عِ
verses.translation: И в знак земли, способной раскрываться (Для излияния воды иль прорастанья злаков)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> لَقَوْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14434'>لٌ ف</tajweed>َصْلٌ
verses.translation: Сие - поистине, решающее Слово (Для различения Добра и Зла)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَا هُوَ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14435'>ٱ</tajweed>لْهَزْلِ
إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُمْ يَكِيدُونَ كَيْدًا

فَمَهِّلِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14436'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>فِرِينَ أَمْهِلْهُمْ رُوَيْدَۢا
verses.translation: Дай же отсрочку им - Отсрочь им мягко, нанемного
